price: (49) This is a reminder. And indeed, for the righteous is a good place of return -
arabic: هَٰذَا ذِكۡرٞۚ وَإِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسۡنَ مَـَٔابٖ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: hādhā dhik'run wa-inna lil'muttaqīna laḥus'na maābin
